    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ATTACK_DELAY
      Attack Delay (in seconds)
      CHALLENGE_LEN
      Challenge length
      MAX_ATTACKS
      PIN verification failures before token should be erased
      MODE
      Token mode - MODE_EVENTSYNC - Event synchronous, - MODE_TIMESYNC - time synchronous, - MODE_OCRACR - challenge response (OCRA)
      NUMERIC_ONLY_PIN_ALLOWED
      0: Off (Do not allow numeric only PIN), 1: On (Allow numeric only PIN)
      OTP_COMPLEXITY
      OTP Complexity 0: Decimal, 1: Hexadecimal, 2: Base32, 3: Base64
      OTP_PROTECTIVE_SUSPEND
      Time interval to suspend generation of the next OTP (in seconds).
      PASS_CODE_LEN
      Pass Code length
      PIN_CACHING
      PIN Caching - 0: Off, 1: On
      PIN_LEN
      Pin length
      PIN_USE_CHANGES
      This parameter specifies the count of correct PIN entries after which the PIN is changed.
      PIN_VERIFICATION_ACTIVE
      0: Off (No PIN Verification during Login to token (failure during OTP usage)) 1: On (Pin Verification failure during Token login)
      POLICY_LEVEL
      DskppPolicy level
      SECURE_MODE
      Secure Mode 0: Off, 1: On
      TOTP_TIME_INTERVAL
      Time Interval for Time Based Token (in seconds)
      TRANSACTION_SIGN
      Transaction Signing 0: Off.
      TRIVIAL_PIN_ALLOWED
      0: Off (Do not allow trivial PIN), 1: On (Allow trivial PIN)
      UNDEFINED
